bug.author: arashashari
bug.summary: DeepSpeed Examples Should Use DeepSpeed Launcher
bug.description: Currently BingBertSquad is not using DeepSpeed Launcher. All examples should use the launcher.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/arashashari>@arashashari</denchmark-link> Thanks for creating this issue, but it really belongs in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/DeepSpeedExamples/issues/11>DeepSpeedExamples</denchmark-link> .
